Have you ever heard of virtual business? The solutions is Front Desk Helpers virtual office&call center

Have you ever thought of setting up your own business to work remotely? Take a chance and try – itwill change your management and business concept fundamentally! Change your business and make it ready to communicate the way your customers want to. That’s why we want you to offer today Front Desk Helpers Virtual office call center presentation! But at the beginning, if you want to succeed today in any of your business activity area you need to know the most important surprising facts of virtual reality 2017.

Front Desk Helpers Virtual office call center presentation: virtual office and remote call center –outbound calls

First of all, more than 70% of callers do not want to listen to the automated phone system. So, theywill hang up if they can’t reach a live person and they will form an impression of any business within first seven seconds. The second thing, that really matters, that about 45% of customers made their purchase by telephone in 2017. More than 90% of marketing budgets were spent in order to get consumers to call. And more than 30% of all callers will never call you back again if they didn’t reach you for the first time.
